argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frlmvscaval.y | |- Y = ( R freeLMod I ) |
| 2 |  | frlmvscaval.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | frlmvscaval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | frlmvscaval.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | frlmvscaval.a | |- ( ph -> A e. K ) |
| 6 |  | frlmvscaval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | frlmvscaval.j | |- ( ph -> J e. I ) |
| 8 |  | frlmvscaval.v | |- .xb = ( .s ` Y ) |
| 9 |  | frlmvscaval.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 | #P_frlmvscafval | |- ( ph -> ( A .xb X ) = ( ( I X. { A } ) oF .x. X ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A .xb X ) ` J ) = ( ( ( I X. { A } ) oF .x. X ) ` J ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fnconstg | |- ( A e. K -> ( I X. { A } ) Fn I ) |
| 13 | 5, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( I X. { A } ) Fn I ) |
| 14 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_frlmbasf | |- ( ( I e. W /\ X e. B ) -> X : I --> K ) |
| 15 | 4, 6, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> X : I --> K ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( X : I --> K -> X Fn I ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> X Fn I ) |
| 18 |  | #P_fnfvof | |- ( ( ( ( I X. { A } ) Fn I /\ X Fn I ) /\ ( I e. W /\ J e. I ) ) -> ( ( ( I X. { A } ) oF .x. X ) ` J ) = ( ( ( I X. { A } ) ` J ) .x. ( X ` J ) ) ) |
| 19 | 13, 17, 4, 7, 18 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I X. { A } ) oF .x. X ) ` J ) = ( ( ( I X. { A } ) ` J ) .x. ( X ` J ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_fvconst2g | |- ( ( A e. K /\ J e. I ) -> ( ( I X. { A } ) ` J ) = A ) |
| 21 | 5, 7, 20 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( I X. { A } ) ` J ) = A ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I X. { A } ) ` J ) .x. ( X ` J ) ) = ( A .x. ( X ` J ) ) ) |
| 23 | 11, 19, 22 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A .xb X ) ` J ) = ( A .x. ( X ` J ) ) ) |
